name: XenoAnima
description:
Info

XenoAnima is a shoot ‘em up game in which the player controls a cyborg frog and fights in its ruined swamp against terrifying octopoid and molluscoid invaders. Evade enemies, destroy foes, and defend your home.

 Use the arrow keys (or the WASD keys) to move, and the space bar to shoot enemies. Some enemies will try to damage you by shooting you; others by colliding with you. Each damage dealt loses you a life; once you lose all three lives, you lose the level.

 

Features

-5 unique levels plus a tutorial

-5 enemies

-good pixel-art graphics

-fast, action-packed, challenging gameplay
